Don't reinvent the feed. Stream's feed technology saves you months of engineering time and allows you to focus on what makes your app unique.Stream helps companies build social apps. Many of today's most popular apps such as Instagram, Pinterest, Spotify and Runkeeper show content from the people you follow in realtime. Building this type of functionality in house is expensive and takes months to complete. Stream offers a hosted API based on cloud and big data best practises, which enables developers to add social functionalities to their apps in hours instead of months.

SendGrid is the world's largest email Infrastructure as a Service provider. Our email delivery service moves 2% of the world's non-spam email (over 24 billion emails/month) for more than 180,000 companies including technology leaders like Uber, Spotify, and Airbnb. Since graduating from the Boulder Techstars accelerator in 2009, SendGrid has raised $48M in funding from Bain Capital Ventures, Bessemer Venture Partners, Foundry Group, 500 Startups, and several other notable investors. -Contributed over 30% (3M+) of SendGrids total monthly revenue -Lead sales team in total outbound activities and meetings -Assisted with strategic selling opportunities with Business Development and Partner teams-Worked closely with C-level leadership on enterprise and strategic opportunities

- Managed as many as 7 Account Executives and Senior Account Executives- Averaged over 105% to quota for 2015 -Worked closely with management to create training plan for educating sales team on competitors, selling value, releasing new pricing, and onboarding new team members. - Completed over 75 interviews in hiring for the sales team and served on many cross-functional interviews for teams such as Info Sec., customer success, marketing, legal, engineering. -Attended domestic and international trade shows and events

SendGrid's cloud-based email infrastructure relieves businesses of the cost and complexity of maintaining custom email systems. SendGrid provides reliable delivery, scalability and real-time analytics along with flexible API's that make custom integration a breeze.  -Top performer for sales team, averaged over 105% (112% of quota for Q4, 128% of quota Q2). -Worked closely with fellow team members on technical questions, internal process and sales strategy.- Developed relationships and process to interact with engineering teams on sales questions and requests.

VincentBenjamin knows technology and the talent resources needed to make your organization a winning one. Not only do we stay on top of a carefully managed network of top tier technology candidates and consultants, we also stay on top of the trends that shape the technology requirements in today's complex business environment. VincentBenjamin has the technology resources you need to not only fill an opening, but to build your business.-Developed new business working directly with C-Level executives to negotiate fee requirements and write new job orders.-Responsible for identifying and evaluating clients’ short-term and long-term needs to assist in creating hiring plans.    -Managed recruitment process for multiple clients from sourcing candidates, coordinating interviews, and negotiating offers for both direct-hire and contract positions. -Sourced high-level candidates through social media marketing, cold calling, reference calls and networking for positions in Denver, CO and throughout the U.S.  -Assessed candidates’ technical skills, personality and competency to perform the tasks of the job requisition.

recommendations: Nabheet Sandhu
Software Engineer IV at GoDaddy
September 3, 2013, Nabheet worked with Kristin but at different companies

I met Kristin during my job search and have been totally amazed by her dedication, commitment and honesty in finding the perfect opportunity for me. She walked me through the different companies where we could apply for a job and which ones would be a great cultural fit for me. I was more than a resume and resource to her. She treated me like a human being and helped me think through a really important decision in my career path. She would ask me about my family and give me a level of personal attention that I have never received from any other recruiter. She has periodically checked in with me about my progress at my new employer. Overall, this was the most pleasant (as much as it could be) process that I have experienced.

Rob Piers
I’m helping PR professionals measure their business impact and make data-driven decisions.
November 17, 2014, Kristin worked with Rob in different groups

I had the pleasure of working with Rob while he was a Technical Account Manager at SendGrid.  He served as a invaluable resource during the sales process.  He assisted me (and many on the sales team) with technical questions for our High Volume clients, answered deliverability questions and provided deliverability consulting and was key in closing a few High Volume deals. He also worked with others on his team to serve as a liaison with many of our Technical Partners.  He did internal presentations on our integration partners and acted as a resource on providing more details on what various partners did, how they fit into SendGrid and how our customers could benefit from them.Rob is someone that people love to be around and work with everyday. He brings a lot of laughs and joy to those around him.  It was a pleasure to work with him and I would recommend him without reservation.
